documents.document: Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you. Ralph Waldo Emerson
#quotes Up, sluggard, and waste not life; in the grave will be sleeping enough.
Choose you friends like your books: few but choice. AmericanProverb
Don't worry about people stealing your ideas. If your ideas are any good, you'll have to ram them down people's throats. Howard Aiken
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment JIM ROHN
It's easy to make a buck. It's a lot tougher to make a difference. Tom Brokaw
Things which matter most must never be at the mercy of things which matter least. Goethe
Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is. Vince Lombardi
Give even an onion graciously. Afghan Proverb
#quotes Strong, deeply rooted desire is the starting point of all achievement.
#quotes It helps a ton when you learn people's names and don't butcher them when trying to pronounce them.
#quotes High achievement always takes place in a framework of high expectation.
#quotes I'm not a sponge exactly, but I find that something I look at is a great opportunity for ideas.
Sir, my concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right Abe Lincoln
The successful person makes a habit of doing what the failing person doesn't like to do. Thomas Edison
Bad actions lead to worse reactions. AmericanProverb
What kills a skunk is the publicity it gives itself. Abe Lincoln
Where there is no shame, there is no honor. Afghan Proverb
The only source of knowledge is experience Albert Einstein
A wise enemy is better than a foolish friend Afghan Proverb
Abundance, like want, ruins many.AmericanProverb
Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition. Abe Lincoln
He that is of the opinion money will do everything may well be suspected of doing everything for money. Benjamin Franklin
If you deal in camels, make the doors high. Afghan Proverb
#quotes It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
The invisible hand of the market always moves faster and better than the heavy hand of government.
The giving of love is an education in itself Eleanor Roosevelt
You think of water when the well is empty. Afghan Proverb
Morale is when your hands and feet keep on working when your head says it can't be done. Benjamin Morrell
#quotes I just feel that my competitive drive is far greater than anyone else that Ive met, and I think that I thrive on that.
Great necessities call forth great leaders. Abigail Adams
The real glory is being knocked to your knees and then coming back. That's real glory. That's the essence of it. Vince Lombardi
Oh old hyena eat me without making excuses. Ethiopian Proverb
#quotes Next to doing the right thing, the most important thing is to let people know you are doing the right thing.
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has. M. Mead
"Thunder is good, thunder is impressive; but it is lightning that does the work. " - Mark Twain
Before honor is humility. AmericanProverb
#quotes Wealth is power. With wealth many things are possible.
It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity. Albert Einstein
#quotes Succeeding is not really a life experience that does that much good. Failing is a much more sobering and enlightening experience.
When the tiger kills, the jackal profits. Afghan Proverb
The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.T Edison
Real riches are the riches possessed inside. B. C. Forbes
Happiness comes when we test our skills towards some meaningful purpose. John Stosssel
Try, try, try, and keep on trying is the rule that must be followed to become an expert in anything. W. Clement Stone
The man who can drive himself further once the effort gets painful is the man who will win. Roger Bannister
As you climb the ladder of success, check occasionally to make sure it is leaning against the right wall.
Always put your best foot forward.AmericanProverb
He who conceals his disease cannot expect to be cured. Ethiopian Proverb
Danger begets caution. AmericanProverb
Better to risk a little than to lose the whole. AmericanProverb
Be content and do not heed the goadings of ambitions. AmericanProverb
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.Herman Cain
#quotes Traditional thinking is all about "what is" Future thinking will also need to be about what can be.
Big buckets can be filled at small streams. AmericanProverb
#quotes Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
He who leaves nothing to chance will do few things poorly, but he will do few things. Edward F. Halifax
There is one thing stronger than all the armies in the world, and that is an idea whose time has come. Victor Hugo
Failure is simply a few errors in judgment, repeated every day. JIM ROHN
#quotes There are millions of children today who dont attend school. However, education is the only way to get ahead in this country.
Motivation is the fuel, necessary to keep the human engine running. Zig Ziglar
Diamonds come in small packages. AmericanProverb
I think everyone should experience defeat at least once during their career. You learn a lot from it. Lou Holtz
As you climb the ladder of success, check occasionally to make sure it is leaning against the right wall.
#quotes Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
If someone is going down the wrong road, he doesn't need motivation to speed him up. What he needs is education to turn him around JIM ROHN
#quotes One day our grandchildren will go to museums to see what poverty was like.
After all is said and done, more is said than done.AmericanProverb
The way to get things done is not to mind who gets the credit for doing them. Benjamin Jowett
The chains of habit are too weak to be felt until they are too strong to be broken - Samuel Johnson
Great minds discuss ideas; Average minds discuss events; Small minds discuss people Eleanor Roosevelt
#quotes I am no longer an advocate of elaborate techniques of security analysis in order to find superior value opportunities.
Questions provide the key to unlocking our unlimited potential. Anthony Robbins
A dose of adversity is often as needful as a dose of medicine.AmericanProverb
#quotes If you wait until all the lights are "green" before you leave home, you'll never get started on your trip to the top.
No one can defeat us unless we first defeat ourselves. Dwight Eisenhower
Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm. Abe Lincoln
Channel your energy. Focus. Carl Lewis
One flower doesn't bring spring. Afghan Proverb
#quotes The future you see is the future you get.
#quotes Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
I became an optimist when I discovered that I wasn't going to win any more games by being anything else. Earl Weaver
A man without a smiling face must not open a shop.AmericanProverb
If you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work. Kahlil Gibran
Don't just read the easy stuff. You may be entertained by it, but you will never grow from it. JIM ROHN
#quotes I am brave, but I take a view. It is an educated view. I am careful. I am not reckless.
If winning isn't everything, why do they keep score? Vincent Lombardi
All complain for want of memory, but none for want of judgment.AmericanProverb
#quotes I think that only daring speculation can lead us further and not accumulation of facts.
"The unexamined life is not worth living." - Socrates
Blood is inherited and virtue acquired AmericanProverb
#quotes When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.
Colin Powell
That some should be rich, shows that others may become rich, and, hence, is just encouragement to industry and enterprise. Abe Lincoln
A forced kindness deserves no thanks.AmericanProverb
Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors. African Proverb
#quotes I have made the tough decisions, always with an eye toward the bottom line. Perhaps it's time America was run like a business.
"People who enjoy what they are doing invariably do it well." - Joe Gibbs
#quotes Twenty years and $40 billion. They seem like good round numbers.
#quotes If you want more, you have to require more from yourself.
